parameters: \talkWe don't have time to go anywhere else!
\talkI was with another \c1adventurer\c and we saved a couple people in a bar near the West
Entrance from being attacked.\. But we got separated along the way.\. I hope they're fine.
\talkI need to get back out there.
\talkHow could monsters have entered the city?
\talkW-What'sh happenlonging?\. I wash dronking at a bar!
\talkI was separated from master. And Ceres and Eris stayed behind.
\talkMaster can take care of himself. But those two \c1item shopkeepers\c...
\talkThere's been some sort of breach at the North and West
\talk I have already sent our remaining \c1higher ranked adventurers\c to
the West Entrance as the \c1knights\c have requested backup over there.
\talkThe rest have been sent to rescue and escort any civilian either here
\talkI need you two to start escorting civilians to safety too.
\talkWhat are you two still doing here
\talkI was at a bar with friends before monsters came in!\.
We're lucky we were saved by some adventurers.
\talkAnd I'm really glad I stayed sober.
\talkC'mon, how are you still drunk after what happened?
\talk\c1Silver ranked adventurers\c and above are encouraged to head to the guild at
the \c1Imperial Capital.\.\c Transport to the \c1Imperial Capital\c will be provided
by the guild. Speak with the guild receptionist for more details.
\talkOnly \c1Iron ranked adventurers\c and above are allowed to attend to requests
that require leaving the city borders.
\talk\c1Copper ranked adventurers\c and below may only attend to requests that
require leaving the city borders when in a party with two or more \c1Iron
\talk\c1The Adventurer's Guild\c was originally started in Liabold. The capital city of
\c1Liebald Kingdom\c. It was a place civilians put up requests along with compensation that
\talkEventually, branches opened up in other towns in the \c1Liebald Kingdom.\c Until
eventually, it spread across all nations of the \c1Valian Continent.\c
\talkThere is also a ranking system within the guild to dictate how capable an \c1adventurer\c is.
Ranging from the starting rank of \c1Stone rank\c and the highest rank of \c1Platinum rank\c.
\talkNowadays, people throughout the \c1Valian Continent\c utilize the guild's services for a
variety of reasons. Farmers who need to exterminate monsters eating their crops,
cooks who need monster parts as ingredients, Item and armor shopkeepers who need
materials for crafting items or weapons, etc.
\talk\c1Silver ranked adventurers\c and above are encouraged to head to the guild at
the \c1Imperial Capital.\.\c Transport to the \c1Imperial Capital\c will be provided
by the guild. Speak with the guild receptionist for more details.
\talkOnly \c1Iron ranked adventurers\c and above are allowed to attend to requests
that require leaving the city borders.
\talk\c1Copper ranked adventurers\c and below may only attend to requests that
require leaving the city borders when in a party with two or more \c1Iron
Read a book titled \c1"The Valian Continent"\c?
\talk\c1The Valian Continent\c is comprised of four different nations. The great \c1Greseal Empire\c
to the north which has grown by uniting various lands within its empire.
\talkThe \c1Liebald Kingdom\c to the south, known for its lush green forests
and rich mines under the rulership of \c1Queen Liza III\c.
\talkThe \c1Empire\c and the \c1Kingdom\c are separated by the \c1Amethyst-Caeurulem
Mountain Ranges\c of which both nations equally own half of.
\talk\c1The Nephiad Alliance\c to the east is comprised of an alliance of mountain cities.
\talkAnd lastly, \c1Lilac State\c a large city at the heart of the continent
and serves as the crossroads inbetween all the nations.
\talk\c1Silver ranked adventurers\c and above are encouraged to head to the guild at
the \c1Imperial Capital.\.\c Transport to the \c1Imperial Capital\c will be provided
by the guild. Speak with the guild receptionist for more details.
\talkOnly \c1Iron ranked adventurers\c and above are allowed to attend to requests
that require leaving the city borders.
\talk\c1Copper ranked adventurers\c and below may only attend to requests that
require leaving the city borders when in a party with two or more \c1Iron
Read a book titled \c1"Spells and Elements"\c?
\talkPeople in the \c1Valian Continent\c are born with an affinity for a certain
\c1element\c. You can tell a person's \c1element\c from their eye color.
\talkThe very first \c1spell\c people usually learn is the \c1Analyze spell\c which tells the user
the target's current status. Once a person has mastered the most basic \c1spell,\c they
will gain the ability to learn \c1spells\c using \c1skill scrolls\c.
\talkHowever, a person may only use \c1skill scrolls\c of \c1spells\c they have
a matching \c1affinity\c with. It is not impossible for a person to learn
\c1spells\c of a different \c1element\c however, it is much more difficult.
\talkIt has recently been discovered that a person that being close with someone of one
\c1element\c will allow that person to learn \c1spells\c of their friend's \c1element\c.
\talk\c1Silver ranked adventurers\c and above are encouraged to head to the guild at
the \c1Imperial Capital.\.\c Transport to the \c1Imperial Capital\c will be provided
by the guild. Speak with the guild receptionist for more details.
\talkOnly \c1Iron ranked adventurers\c and above are allowed to attend to requests
that require leaving the city borders.
\talk\c1Copper ranked adventurers\c and below may only attend to requests that
require leaving the city borders when in a party with two or more \c1Iron
Read a book titled \c1"Shops in Valia"\c?
\talkIn most major towns in \c1The Valian continent\c, there exists three main shops.
\talk\c1Item Shops\c which are where people can buy consumable items used on travels
\talk\c1Weapon Shops\c where smiths forge new weapons or maintain or upgrade
\talkAnd lastly, \c1Magic Shops\c which sells \c1Spell Scrolls\c that allow the user
to learn a \c1spell\c so long as the spell is the same \c1element\c as the user.
\talkThe \c1shopkeepers\c of these three types of shops, all move to a different
shop in a different town every week in a rotation.
\talkThese \c1shopkeepers\c typically use monster parts as materials for crafting
items, weapons and skill scrolls.\. Usually, they utilize the services of
the \c1Adventurer's Guild\c to obtain these materials.
\talk\c1Silver ranked adventurers\c and above are encouraged to head to the guild at
the \c1Imperial Capital.\.\c Transport to the \c1Imperial Capital\c will be provided
by the guild. Speak with the guild receptionist for more details.
\talkOnly \c1Iron ranked adventurers\c and above are allowed to attend to requests
that require leaving the city borders.
\talk\c1Copper ranked adventurers\c and below may only attend to requests that
require leaving the city borders when in a party with two or more \c1Iron
\talkI'm really scared. But I know that inside this building is technically
the safest place to be in.
